scenario_text.value:
So these are all drawings of Kemonogami?
They come in all shapes and sizes, huh?

Hey. Why do you think there are there so many
Kemonogami in the first place?
Do you have a hunch, sir?

Indeed. There are several possible
explanations for all this.

The unique terrain could explain the frequent
incidents. Weak footholds, steep slopes...

Magnetic fields mess with sense of direction,
and overgrowth in flora and fauna.
Ahh... Like the red spider lilies, then?

I believe thereâ€™s something in the minerals
around here that makes people lose their way.

Creatures of the Kemonogami faith may have
been altered somehow by this substance...
I see... That would make sense.
